explanation: There is a mix of opinions but several users expect BTC to move up from the 106,600-106,800 zone, referencing support levels and possible reversals. A few express caution about shorting and note high liquidation near 105k, suggesting downside risk, but the positive sentiment toward a bounce is more frequent. Some users mention sideways or choppy market with possible retest of support, so confidence is not high.
